@website.sugarcss-coffeekraken-io.sugar..name: List
@website.sugarcss-coffeekraken-io.sugar..description: These classes allows you to apply list lnfs to any ul, ol, dl, etc...

example.title: dl
example.code:
• Global Quality Manager Kristi Wisozk
  • Dynamic Markets Liaison Mr. Eva Larkin
  • Product Communications Specialist Dana Marquardt

example.title: ul
example.code:
• Lead Tactics Assistant Jeannette Russel
  • Direct Program Coordinator Allen Leuschke
  • Future Research Director Geneva Feest DVM

example.title: ol
example.code:
• Legacy Markets Analyst Elsie Yundt
  • Product Data Director Cesar Schultz
  • Corporate Program Orchestrator Brooke Collins

example.title: icon
example.code:
• Dynamic Operations Engineer Russell Wintheiser
  • National Brand Manager Myrtle Jerde
  • Customer Mobility Administrator Mrs. Wayne DuBuque

example.title: RTL Support
example.code:
• Central Branding Agent Dan Bernier
  • Chief Security Executive Alma Greenfelder
  • Principal Program Producer Roger Hammes
  • Global Creative Manager Alan Lehner
  • Regional Research Supervisor Garry Mertz
  • District Paradigm Officer Kelvin Huel

example.title: Colors (none-exhaustive)
example.code:
• Principal Marketing Consultant Miss Christie McKenzie
  • Global Group Administrator Joyce Grady
  • Lead Brand Executive Lora Dickens
